Alias.name: ofht
Alias.script:
local num = matches[4] or "1"
local action if matches[2] == "h" then action = "hit" else action = "bash" end
local target if matches[3] == "t" then target = MUME.target else target = MUME.mount end
local cmd = string.format("order followers %s %s.%s", action, num, target) send(cmd)

Alias.name: shoot + escape
Alias.script:
local dir = matches[2] local num = matches[3] or "1" local reverseDirs = { ["e"] = "w", ["w"] = "e", ["s"] = "n", ["n"] = "s", ["u"] = "d", ["d"] = "u" }
send(dir) send("shoot " .. num .. "." .. MUME.target) send("escape " .. reverseDirs[dir])

Alias.name: bs + escape
Alias.script:
local dir = matches[2] local num = matches[3] or "1" local reverseDirs = { ["e"] = "w", ["w"] = "e", ["s"] = "n", ["n"] = "s", ["u"] = "d", ["d"] = "u" }
send(dir) send("backstab " .. num .. "." .. MUME.target) send("escape " .. reverseDirs[dir])

Alias.name: combat
Alias.script:
local commands = { ["ht"] = "hit", ["bst"] = "backstab", ["sht"] = "shoot", ["bt"] = "bash", ["bdt"] = "bash disengage", ["kt"] = "kill", ["tt"] = "track", ["wt"] = "where", ["xt"] = "examine", } local target = MUME.target or "" if string.sub(matches[3], #matches[3]) == "m" then target = MUME.mount or "" end local cmd = replace_char(#matches[3], matches[3], "t") local command = commands[cmd] or "kill" local num = matches[4] or "1" local dir = matches[5] or ""
local formattedNum = (num .. ".")
if command == "track" or command == "where" then formattedNum = "" end
send(string.format("%s %s%s", command, formattedNum, target))

Alias.name: target
Alias.script:
if matches[4] then MUME.target = matches[4] end
echo(string.format(" [ target: %s ]\n", MUME.target or ""))

Alias.name: targets
Alias.script: switch({ ["telf"] = function() expandAlias("target *elf*", false) end, ["torc"] = function() expandAlias("target *orc*", false) end, ["tdwa"] = function() expandAlias("target *dwarf*", false) end, ["ttro"] = function() expandAlias("target *troll*", false) end, ["thob"] = function() expandAlias("target *hobbit*", false) end, ["thelf"] = function() expandAlias("target *half-elf*", false) end, ["tman"] = function() expandAlias("target *man*", false) end, }):case(matches[1])

Alias.name: mount
Alias.script:
if matches[4] then MUME.mount = matches[4] end
echo(string.format(" [ mount: %s ]\n", MUME.mount or ""))

Alias.name: move + hit
Alias.script:
local flee = matches[3] local dir = matches[2] local num = matches[4] or "1"
send(dir) expandAlias("ht" .. num)
if flee ~= "" then send("flee") end

Alias.name: bash + hit
Alias.script:
local flee = matches[3] local dir = matches[2] local num = matches[4] or "1"
send(dir) expandAlias("bt" .. num)
if flee ~= "" then send("flee") end

Script.name: init
Script.script: if not MUME then MUME = {} end

Script.name: target
Script.script: if not MUME.target then MUME.target = "orc" end if not MUME.mount then MUME.mount = "warg" end
